players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I'm shocked Charlie was killed. Let's discuss and share thoughts on who might be the mafioso."
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We should vote her out."
You: "Diana, that's a complete lie! I'm innocent and not the mafioso. Why are you accusing me so fast? Maybe you're trying to shift suspicion."
Diana: "I stand by my investigation—Alice is the mafioso. We can't afford to let her manipulate us; vote her out to save the town."
